TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務是否在 (也就是可在) 與 ASP.NET 相容的模式中執行。

span.span: Specifies whether a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service runs, or can run, in a mode that is compatible with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 相容性模式可讓 WCF 服務使用 ASP 功能，例如身分識別模擬。compatibility mode allows WCF services to use ASP features such as identity impersonation. 這是透過 Web.config 檔案在應用程式層級啟用的，而且無法由應用程式中巢狀的 Web.config 檔案覆寫。It is enabled at the application level through the Web.config file and cannot be overridden by Web.config files nested in the application. 當服務未指定值，其取得預設允許的行為。When the value is not specified for a service, it gets Allowed behavior by default. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md)。For more information, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). ## Examples 服務開發人員可以確保，其服務才會執行在 ASP.NET 相容性模式中設定屬性上的為必要，如下列範例所示：Service developers can ensure that their service is only run in ASP.NET Compatibility Mode by setting the property on the to Required as shown in the following example: [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode Allowed = int32(1)

summary.span: 在 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 相容性模式設定為 或 的情況下，WCF 服務可以在應用程式網域中執行。

span.span: WCF services can run in an application domain with [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode set to or .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode NotAllowed = int32(0)

summary.span: 在 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 相容性模式設定為 的情況下，WCF 服務必須在應用程式網域中執行。

span.span: WCF services must run in an application domain with [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode set to .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode Required = int32(2)

summary.span: 在 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 相容性模式設定為 的情況下，WCF 服務必須在應用程式網域中執行。

span.span: WCF services must run in an application domain with [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode set to .
